text: Denis Tillinac (26 May 1947 – 26 September 2020) was a French writer and journalist.Denis Tillinac n'aurait pas pu être de gauche : « Chez eux, tout se vaut », Le Parisien, 5 May 2012 He was born in Paris. He wrote a weekly column in Valeurs actuelles. He was a close friend to President Jacques Chirac.Tillinac invite Le Pen à soutenir Sarkozy, Le Figaro, 25 April 2012 He was a Catholic and wrote books about the Catholic origins of France.Matthieu Mégevand, Denis Tillinac : "Hors de l'amour de Dieu, je me fous de tout" , Le Monde des Religions, 27 January 2011 Tillinac died on 26 September 2020 at the age of 73.Mort de Denis Tillinac, écrivain, éditeur et polémiste qui animait la vie de la droite ==References== Category:Writers from Paris Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French journalists Category:French political writers
title: Denis Tillinac
